description:
EIM GUI: Cross-Platform ESP-IDF Installation Manager


What's Changed
- fixed wizard step navigation by @Hahihula in #351
- EIM-437 now we can get clear message from python runtime in case of non-utf8 output by @Hahihula in #357
- EIM-433-offline-installer-pipeline-enhancement by @Hahihula in #355
- [EIM-442] [Test] Update offline archive download by @Fabricio-ESP in #363
- EIM-382 improve logging in whole project by @Hahihula in #359
- EIM-441-fix-rpm-pipeline by @Hahihula in #358
- EIM-445 fix offline installer feature selection by @Hahihula in #362
- EIM-419 Added python 3.14 to a list of supported python versions by @Hahihula in #346
- EIM-453 hardcode clang dependency for offline installer by @Hahihula in #371
- EIM-449: skipped mirrors checking in offline mode by @alirana01 in #367
Full Changelog: v0.7.0...v0.7.1
